def capitalize_words(text):
    # This function takes a string and capitalizes each word in the string
    words = text.split(' ')
    capitalized_words = [word.capitalize() for word in words]
    return ' '.join(capitalized_words)

def main():
    # Main function to demonstrate the capitalize_words function
    sample_text = "hello world! this is an example text."
    capitalized_text = capitalize_words(sample_text)
    print(capitalized_text)

# Call the main function to run the program
main()
